text: Lost Highway is the tenth studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and was released on June 19, 2007 through Island and Mercury Records. It topped the album charts in Austria, Canada, Denmark, Germany, Japan, the Netherlands, Switzerland and the United States. It went to number 2 in Australia, New Zealand, Spain and the United Kingdom and number 3 in Argentina, Finland and Hungary. == Track listing == Category:2007 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: Lost Highway (Bon Jovi album)
